report.title: Track-a-tree: Samples Comment (Field Diary) entries for a warehouse user
report.description: A list of samples with comments filtered according to the ID of the user as registered on the warehouse.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id JOIN locations sl ON sl.id=l.parent_id JOIN termlists_terms ttl1 ON ttl1.id=s.sample_method_id JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id JOIN terms t ON ttl2.term_id=t.id AND (CAST(ttl2.id AS character varying)='#sample_method_id#' OR '#sample_method_id#'='' OR t.term='#sample_method_id#') #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (CAST(s.created_by_id AS character varying)='#iUserID#' OR '#iUserID#'='') #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: iUserID
param.description: Enter the ID of the warehouse user

param.name: sample_method_id
param.description: Select the sample method, or leave blank to not filter by sample method.
